tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Dr Manjusha for PCOD. Though I know I am having these issues due to my overweight. I visited many doctors in past for same issue. They all said go and reduce weight and put me on some tablets. Dr Manjusha helped in understanding the issue clearly. She helped me in making a calendar and guided me. She is the mentor in my life. I reduced 10 kg . And now my PCOD is alright. I am lucky to visit her. She is best for PCOD

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had 20 weeks size fibroid. During my last pregnancy it was 12cm.i was worried about it. Dr Manjusha fully explained the issues related to big fibroid. She explained all possible methods for cure. We were worried about cancer in it. She fully checked me. Did tests to clear if any such possibility. Afterwards she suggested me to go for open surgery in view of very big fibroid. So that we do not do any spill. As my MRI was a little bit suspicious. By God grace and doctor good clinical acumen my final biopsy is normal. * **** ** ***** ** ******* ** ******** *** **** ********* ** *** ******** She is not in hurry to do as per our hurry. She made me understand need of the tests so I do not lend up in second surgery after biopsy report. I recommend everyone to visit for their gyne issue to her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Dr Manjusha for fibroids issue seven years back. She explained as I wanted to keep uterus she kept me on regular check ups. Now size is big and I am uncomfortable. I got my hysterectomy done laparoscopic by her. Thanks üôèfor being their. I will recommend Dr Manjusha for good treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: She has given very good in psychological support nicely explained about the procedure and potential effect of the surgery skillful enduring surgery and nice nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Manjusha for pre conception advice. She prescribed some tests for me and husband. Our nutrition and requirements were heard by doctor in detail. She didn't forced us to go for pregnancy but explained medical issues. As we both were not very sure about this, her advice really helped us. She is good doctor for such consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Manjusha for pain abdomen. Ultrasound was showing large twisted ovarian cyst. She operated on laparoscopy. I was well with in 24 hour. My post op was also very good. Painless. I am fully working in 10 days. Dr Manjusha gives lots of positive energy and encourages early movement. I visited her by recommendations of my relative. I am fully satisfied

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had fibroids. My deliveries were also with Dr Manjusha. For eight years she kept me on no surgery. Now the fibroid size is big. So I requested her to remove it. She did my fibroid removal laparoscopic. My Uterus and ovaries are inside. I had no issues post surgery. I was on normal diet from second day. They gave me water six hour after my surgery. Hospital CK Birla is good where she operated me. I will highly recommend the doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Today, my wife and I visited Dr. Manjusha Goel's clinic at CK Birla Hospital Punjabi Bagh for childbirth education, and the experience was exceptional. From the moment we booked the appointment until we left, everything flowed seamlessly. It only took us 15 minutes to book the appointment and visit the gynecologist, which was incredibly convenient. *** ****** **** ********* *** ********* ** *** ***** **** ******* ********** *** ************ She patiently addressed all our concerns and provided valuable insights, making us feel well-prepared and confident. Moreover, her friendly demeanor and genuine care for her patients were truly commendable. Dr. Goel is more than just a doctor; she's a blessing to us. We're grateful for her guidance and highly motivated approach towards her profession. We wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Manjusha Goel to anyone seeking exceptional care during their childbirth journey.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I don't know from where to start, I started visiting doctor in 2016 when I had a miscarriage. I was diagnosed with PCOD but followed Dr. Manjusha's instructions to maintain a healthy lifestyle and weight management. With her complete hand holding and trust in me, I successfully came upto her expectations in weight loss and health issues. Now I must say that she handled my both pregnancies very dedicatedly and never left me feel low. With God's and Dr. Manjusha's blessings, today we're parents and completed our family.
Also recently she handled a critical case of my mother which could have worsen with time if left untreated with her **** ********* *** experience. I am always grateful to her. These words are actually not enough to thank her.
Keep growing and glowing, doctor ‚ù§Ô∏è

When I first visited the doctor, I was really trying hard for pregnancy. After continuous treatment from other gynaecologists, for over 2 years, I was recommended dr. Manjusha by my SIL. Under the guidance of doctor, not only I became a mother but I also got a mentor for lifetime. Thanks a lot doctor for everything.

*** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ***. One thing I want to say about her that,"Observation, Reason, Human Understanding, Courage" are the qualities of perfect doctors n u have all these qualities in u. As a person ur the best human being, who always there to motivates your patients. Thanks for always been there for me . ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
